entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
